name: Vowel
description: This is a assignment to learn how to write package.json files. The index.js file was given by our lecturers via https://github.com/cmda-be/course-17-18/blob/master/week-2.md . The package.json file was written after an example by Jon Schlinkert's 'repeat-string' package.json via https://github.com/jonschlinkert/repeat-string/blob/master/package.json
author: Folkert-Jan van der Pol (http://github.com/FJvdPol)
